name: Brass Knuckles Texas Special
additionalNotes: BRASS KNUCKLES TEXAS SPECIAL is a full-bodied, full-strength 5x54 short toro with a broom foot. The wrapper is a 9-year-aged Broadleaf maduro leaf. Fillers are medio tiempo, visos, and ligeros from Nicaragua and 2 other places that will remain secret. All tobacco is aged between 6-11 years.
